light_options.title: Configure light options
light_options.description:
Turn on a light based on motion detection, and light level. Turn off a light when there isn't motion. Everything is optional.

If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-smart-controller

occupancy.title: Configure occupancy sensor
occupancy.description:
Create an occupancy sensor based on motion sensor(s) and, optionally, door sensors and other entities.

If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-smart-controller

data.motion_sensors: Occupancy will be detected for specified time whenever motion is detected by these sensors.
data.door_sensors: OPTIONAL: Occupancy will be detected indefinitely if motion is seen in a room while all doors are closed--even after motion stops. Only add door sensors when all access points for an area have sensors.
data.required_entities: OPTIONAL: These must all be 'on' before occupancy will be detected.
data.other_entities: OPTIONAL: Occupancy will be detected if any of these are 'on'.

error.manual_control_no_motion: Manual control requires a motion sensor.
error.duplicate_name: An integration with the same name already exists.

abort.nothing_to_control: No entities are available to control
abort.already_configured: An integration with the same fan already exists.
